segments.text: Good afternoon ! Did you call for a plumber ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , yes I did . Please come in ! I ’ m so glad you came ! This old house is falling apart ! Come on into the bathroom . See , here , there ’ s water leaking everywhere !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Let me have a look . It seems that your toilet is clogged , and that ’ s why it won ’ t flush . Let me just get my plunger . No , that ’ s not working either . I suspect that there ’ s some sort of foreign object in the pipes that ‘ s causing a blockage . That ’ s what ’ s making your toilet overflow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that must be because of my four-year-old daughter . She is always flushing things down the toilet . You know how kids are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I have a little one myself . Anyway , these water pipes are really rusty , so they also should be changed . Thatcould be causing water to not drain completely , that might lead to more problems in the future . I would also suggest fixing this faucet that isn ’ t shutting off properly . I could have it all finished by today if it ’ s urgent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be great ! Is it expensive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s see ... I would say about eight hundred dollars .
segments.speaker: S1
